thread.title: HUD/Characters not rendering at all (Possibly solved)

post.author: ShockwaveS08
post.body:
Hello all,

I am having some problems with Doom 3/ROE (Steam versions): As soon as I left Mars City for the second time and entered Administration, my HUD vanished. Even worse, so did Campbell and his BFG-9000 in this level's cutscene. I remember that with the previous card I had (GTX 460), the guy who gives you your PDA in the first trip through Mars City had disappeared similarly. In both of these cases, the missing characters were completely silent. I will publish a full list of mods and computer specs in the hope that you kind people will assist me in getting this resolved. Thank you all for your time.

MODS
Wulfen's Texture Pack 2.0
Monoxead's Texture Pack
Sikkmod 1.3 for D3Base with Relief Mapping
Sikkmod Lite 1.2 for D3ROE with Relief Mapping
Plasmagun Radar from FileFront's Doom 3 section
A custom version of Venom's HQ MainMenu for Sikkmod that just so happens to extend to the in-world HUD and computer displays: http://www.mediafire.com/?9a3wb9xqaqf88wg

COMPUTER SPECS
Base Computer: ASUS CG1330
Processor: AMD Phenom II X6 1045T (6-core)
RAM: 8GB
Graphics Card: EVGA/NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 SC+ (4GB)
Hard Drive: 1TB (497GB Free)
Sound: Logitech G930 Wireless 7.1 Surround Sound Headset
Primary Display: HP 2511x (1920x1080)
Secondary Display: LG L227W (1680x1050)

Quote:
WARNING: file def/map_admin.def, line 55: Unknown entityDef 'char_campbell_bfgcase' inherited by 'admin_overhear_campbell'


EDIT: Seems like deleting the .def files for the game's maps in the pak_cleanfiles.pk4 from Sikkmod seems to have fixed the problem.

post.author: DGX24
post.body:
I had that problem with Campbell in the beginning cinematic. After doing your fix for him disappearing, later on I noticed the collapsing monorail skybridge was missing. Not sure what I should do for this.
